com.feilong.core.util.transformer

Class SimpleClassTransformer<T,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.feilong.core.util.transformer.SimpleClassTransformer<T,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - 原来的类型
    V - 转成的结果类型
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Transformer<T,V>

    public class SimpleClassTransformer<T,V>
extends Object
implements Transformer<T,V>, Serializable
    简单的将对象转成指定 targetType 类型的转换器.
    Since:
    1.9.2
    Author:
    feilong
    See Also:
